fields.Title: Working with Authentic Resources - Panel Discussion
fields.Outlet (if applicable): PEARLL Language Resource Center and sponsored by the National Foreign Language Center.
fields.Description/Abstract:
Invited panel member
in a series of monthly virtual panel discussions hosted by the PEARLL Language Resource Center and sponsored by the National Foreign Language Center. We hope to highlight teacher voices through these conversations and share ideas and solutions from practicing teachers like you.

Led by a moderator from the NFLC, the goal of this series of panel discussions will be to open conversations around a guiding question based on a specific TELL Framework Domain on current topics of interest or concern in the world language teacher community.

Here are some details to help inform your decision:

·      Panels are scheduled for a maximum of 60 minutes.

·      Panels will be SYNCHRONOUS events, conducted via video conference and streamed to YouTube.

·      Facilitators will share initial questions with panelists ahead of time but will also monitor the chat box and take questions from the participants as appropriate. 

This invitation is to be a panelist on the following panel:
TELL Domain
Learning Tools
Working with Authentic Resources
January 19
8:00 pm ET
(7:00 pm CT, 6:00 pm MT, 5:00 pm PT)
